short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes you never see the new FHDA MyPortal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you don't like the new MyPortal experience for De Anza and Foothill College, use this extension to never see them again.

This extension just redirects you from myportal.fhda.edu and experience.elluciancloud.com/fdaccdso to the old MyPortal. It also injects CSS on the old MyPortal to remove the "switch to new MyPortal" nag message.
